name: FounderPanel
tag_list: tech, technology, internet, cofounder, co-founder, scale, scaling, startup, start-up, jason-feffer, eli-portnoy, nick-bicanic, marc-pariser, aviv-grill, sam-teller, launchpad-la, sodahead-com, thinknear-com, echoecho-me, misomedia-com, shark-tank, google-
description: Top Tech Founders on the Top Panels
overview:
FounderPanel hosts monthly technology & business panels events in Santa Monica, UCLA & Miracle Mile. With 1,000+ members, we host the top technology founders on the top panels in Southern, CA. We have been invited multiple times to host our SOLD OUT events at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) and have been featured in the Los Angeles Business Journal and other newspapers, magazines and well known blogs.

Featured Panels include: Amobee, eHarmony, OpenTable, Accel Partners, Yahoo, Yammer, SpaceIL, ThinkNear, Cornerstone OnDemand, SodaHead, Clearstone Venture Partners, Hautelook, hipswap, SodaHead, Launchpad LA, Amplify, Cooley, Evolve Media, Gorilla Nation, Grubwithus, Chill, & more…

Twitter: @FounderPanel www.FounderPanel.com

SOLD OUT 11/28/2012: Surviving Year 1 (9) Panelists

SOLD OUT 10/04/2012: The Odd Couple (8) Panelists…the CEO & CTO relationship

SOLD OUT 11/09/2011: Cofounder Matchmaking

milestones.description: "Cofounder Matchmaking" debuts in LA.  This would be the 1st of event of several to sell out and make TCD.LA the fastest growing Tech group in LA's history!

Take a look at Google and Justin Timberlake funded, "Miso Media."  We'll take you on a tour behind the scenes of how this tech sensation got started, funded and now has over 15 team members.  Learn first hand from Aviv Grill, CoFounder/CEO and Brandon Gol
milestones.source_description: Inside Google funded "MisoMedia," a mobile/iPad apps powerhouse!

milestones.description: "Cofounder Matchmaking with Special Guest" is where you'll find your cofounder to build a tech company.  Sam Teller, Managing Director of accelerator Launchpad LA will give you advice and then let you get to it!
